name: Circuit (Markt & Technik)
overview: In Circuit, a shooter created by Hans-Werner Müller and first published in 1993, Mars terrorists have time bombs hidden in a space station. You have little time left to find the deadly explosive charges and to disarm them. You must place the prototype probe on the station and save our people. Later published in both 64'er Sonderheft 97, and in 64'er 1997/11.
